item.description:
Bring a favorite game, a favorite snack or drink and your good sense of humor for a fun night of games! Relax and socialize and get to know each other better as we compete for the extreme game player award!

If you are not into games, just come for the socializing. There will be something for everyone. An inexpensive, relaxing fun night out with friends...that's what it's all about.

This is a joint event with "Spice of Life too short"

Directions will be sent the day before to all positive responses.
item.name: Game Night/Socializing at Christina's House
